concept.title: Follow Conversation
concept.shortdesc: Allows users to receive email notifications when conversations they follow are changed.

conbody.p: Following a conversation allows users to receive email notifications, based on activity in the conversation. Users click the Follow / Unfollow button to set conversation-specific preferences, or use their Profile Settings page to set a site-wide preference to follow conversations.
(The Follow function is not available on mobile.)
conbody.note: Emails will only be sent for manually posted content, not for content pulled into the stream through SocialSync or Curate.
